info.name: MuroBBS  (2013) - CrystalClear theme (Muro teema)
info.description: Completely new kind of theme for Muropaketti's MuroBBS (aka Muro) ! Supports : * Mozilla Firefox 4 & beyond * Partial support for Chrome NOTE: Ad blocking is no more supported by this theme. Use alternative methods and your imagination. ALSO INSTALL BUTTONS & ICONS FOR THE THEME : http://userstyles.org/styles/57028/murobbs-crystalclear-theme-buttons-icons They buttons and icons are in different style sheet at least during the beta stage. (makes my life easier) NOTE THE NEW OPTIONAL FEATURES BELOW THIS LINE !!!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.00 - 2013-03-07 :
    * fixed to work with the new theme
    * has some layout bugs but is usable again

Version 0.90 : 
    * initial version
